name: Nuclear Roots
description:
Made for GBJam #10 -Info- This is a short 4 level demo of a full game hopefully releasing this year! Including a tutorial, cave, autoscroller, and boss levels! Run and jump through these levels as fast as you can to avoid several different plant based enemies along the way! - Story - You're a local AC Repair Man who is called away from your regular line of duty when a nuclear reactor melts down causing all plant life to come alive and dangerous! Venture through plains and caves, run through autorunner segments to try and make your way through the power plant to beat the boss inside!

Music By: TheyCallMeCole
